This Folder is for files and folders, that are pre-bundled in the sense Thirdparty files which are available for production.
Either minified or production's optimized
For instance
* jquery.min.js
* bootstrap.min.css
All these files are added to the bundle folder either dist/dev based on the environment, So inside index.html you can add <script> or <link> tag with the src or href like 
* "./jquery.min.js"
* "./bootstrap.min.css"
